Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Starting with Case 1 The events are in order Application Received then Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Approved Inform Applicant Finalize Documentation Close Case That follows the required sequence perfectly So Case 1 is compliant

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Moving on to Case 2 The first issue I notice is that after Application Received at 0800 the next activity is Risk Assessment at 0820 But according to the normative rules Credit Check must come before Risk Assessment Here they did Risk Assessment first without doing the Credit Check Thats a clear violation of the ordering rule The Credit Check happens later at 0900 but thats after the Risk Assessment

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Then after the Loan Decision Rejected at 0930 they proceed to Finalize Documentation at 1000 But the rules state that if rejected you shouldnt finalize documentation before closing So thats another violation

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Wait the Inform Applicant step is missing here Looking back at the table after Loan Decision at 0930 they went straight to Finalize Documentation at 1000 skipping Inform Applicant Thats another violation So actually three normative violations in Case 2 Risk Assessment before Credit Check Missing Inform Applicant Finalize Documentation after rejection

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: For desiderata in Case 2 The Credit Check was done 20 minutes after application within 24 hours so thats good The informing was skipped which is normative not desiderata Missing Followup Call is a desiderata failure

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: For Case 3 the sequence is correct Application Received Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Approved Inform Applicant Finalize Documentation Close Case So the order is okay all steps present in right order

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: However timing between Application and Credit Check is 2 days more than 24 hours desiderata issue Inform Applicant 3 days after decision over 48 hours another desiderata violation Missing Followup Call desiderata failure Normative rules all followed

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Summarizing Normative Violations Case 2 has three Case 1 and 3 no Desiderata Failures Case 2 missing Followup Call Case 3 delayed Credit Check delayed Inform missing Followup Call

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Suggest interpretations For Case 2 normative violations system error human mistake oversight clerical error For desiderata delays due to workload technical issues missing calls resource constraints or unnecessary
